translation.en: -[bass music playing] -[fingers snapping]
[Loose Caboose] All aboard!
It's time to hop on the Roll Train!
translation.it: È ora di salire sul Roll Train.

translation.en: Tonight's special guests include Upton and the Get Down Bunch, Minnie Vanessa and the Hoods.
translation.it: Gli ospiti di oggi: Upton e gli Scatenati, Minnie Vanessa e i Cofani.

translation.en: And now, here's your locomotive of locomotion,
translation.it: Ed ecco la locomotiva di locomozione,

translation.en: everybody's favorite friend of funk-- D-d-d-d-DJ Train Trax!
translation.it: l'amico del funk più amato da tutti, DJ Treno Trax.

translation.en: Wicka-wicka whoo-whoo! [horn blows]
Hey, rollers and shakers, rockers and breakers!
translation.it: Ehi, rotelle e radiatori, rottami e ammortizzatori!

translation.en: Hey, Loose Caboose, how you feelin' tonight?
I think I'm dyin'.
-[music stops] -Oh, that sounds serious.
Yeah. I'm dying to see tonight's star performer!
translation.it: Già. Sto morendo dalla voglia di vedere la stella di oggi.

translation.en: Well, let's get right to it, then. Wicka-wicka woo-woo!
translation.it: Beh, allora andiamo dritti al punto. Wicky-wicky-ciuf-ciuf!

translation.en: [both] Wicka-wicka woo-woo!
[Loose Caboose] You ready to get down? [DJ Train Trax] Oh, yeah!
translation.it: - Sei pronto a scatenarti? - Oh, sì!

translation.en: Come on, Chrissy. [mimicking Loose Caboose] Let's get down.
Try this one. Uh-huh! Oh, yeah!
-Uh-huh! Oh, yeah! -[Mama, Papa laugh]
Now, let's do the Truck Truck Caboose.
translation.it: E ora, il Vagone di Coda.

translation.en: -Ready? -Ready!
Oh, I love the Truck Truck Caboose!
OK! OK! Here comes a new one I made up.
translation.it: Ok, ecco il nuovo passo che ho inventato.

translation.en: Now you try, Chrissy!
Oh, yeah! Uh-huh! -Oh, yeah! Uh-huh! -Uh-huh! Oh, yeah!
[Mama laughs] Look at you two.
-Oh, look at those tires move! -[laughs]
[Papa] Oh, that's great!
Yeah, you've got it! [laughs]
[laughs] What's that one called?
[laughs] I don't know yet.
You two make a really great dance duo.
Dance with Cory!
[laughs] So, do you think we'll win?
Are you kidding? With those moves?
You two are going to be great at the talent show!
translation.it: Andrete alla grande al talent show.

translation.en: [laughs] Maybe I'll dust off the ol' keytar and play something from my rock opera.
translation.it: Potrei rispolverare la keytar e suonare la mia opera rock.

translation.en: You two are going to be great at the talent show! Hey! What about me?
translation.it: - Andrete alla grande al talent show. - Ehi, e io?

translation.en: I-- I'm just trying to save you from your crippling stage fright.
translation.it: Cerco di salvarti dalla tua ansia da palcoscenico.

translation.en: Ooh, right. I forgot about that.
Ready for the show, you two?
[Cory, Chrissy] Yeah!
Now, what do we have to remember before any performance?
translation.it: Cosa dobbiamo ricordare prima di un'esibizione?

translation.en: Go to the bathroom.
And?
If you play with fire, you're gonna get burned.
translation.it: Se giochi col fuoco, ti brucerai.

translation.en: Not sure how that works for the talent show,
translation.it: Non credo valga per il talent show,

translation.en: but yes. And?
Just have fun! That's right!
Whoa!
Whoa is right! Looks like the whole town showed up.
translation.it: Wow. Sembra che ci sia tutta la città.

translation.en: Come on, Chrissy. Let's go! Oh, yay!
[Papa] Ooh, they've got corn dogs over there!
translation.it: Lì ci sono i corn dog.

translation.en: [Mama] What? No way.
I don't want to hear your exhaust running all night.
translation.it: Passeresti tutta la notte a scaricare.

translation.en: Welcome to the Bumperton Hills 18th Annual Talent Show!
translation.it: Benvenuti al 18° talent show di Bumperton Hills!

translation.en: Oh, it's starting.
Please give it up for your humble host and 17-time winner,
translation.it: Un applauso per l'umile presentatrice e vincitrice per 17 volte,

translation.en: Dr. Ethyl Wiperglass!
That's me!
-[crowd cheering] -[Cory] Yeah! Woohoo!
-Go, Dr. Wiperglass! -[giggling]
Let's hear it for our first contestant, Mrs. O'Tool.
translation.it: Un applauso per la prima concorrente, la signora O'Tool.

translation.en: Excuse me, Carsons.
Whoo! You got this, babe! Whoo-ooh!
Magnificent.
What has four wheels and flies?
translation.it: Cosa allontana rifiuti e attira insetti minuti?

translation.en: -Me! -[crowd laughs]
-Get it? -[drum sting] Me! A garbage truck.
Wow! Everyone is really good. Wow!
translation.it: - Wow! Sono tutti molto bravi. - Wow!

translation.en: Ugh, finally. After 28 years of cleaning up messes,
a chance to sing.
Oh, there you are. Fenderson's called for you.
There's an oil spill on aisle five.
translation.it: C'è una perdita d'olio nella corsia cinque.

translation.en: That means you're next, Carsons.
You ready?
I'm ready. Chrissy?
Ready!
Great!
[breathes out rhythmically] OK, we've got this.
Up next, Cory and Chrissy Carson!
translation.it: I prossimi sono Cory e Chrissy Carson!

translation.en: We got this!
OK, wish us luck! Good luck!
I can't watch.
Oh, yeah.
Oh, yeah.
Oh, yeah. Oh, yeah. Oh, yeah.
translation.it: - Oh, sì! - Oh, sì! Oh, sì!

translation.en: A-ha! [chuckles] Oh, yeah.
[laughs] You're doing great!
OK, Chrissy, let's do the secret move I showed you.
translation.it: Ok, Chrissy, facciamo il passo segreto che ti ho mostrato.

translation.en: [both] Yeah, go, Chrissy!
Huh? Chrissy?
Ta-da! Oh! [chuckles nervously]
-[both laughing] -Yes!
OK, Chrissy. Let's go.
The crowd loved it! You two were great!
translation.it: - Il pubblico l'ha adorato. - Siete stati grandi.

translation.en: Thanks. Yeah! Good job, Chrissy.
[giggles] Dance!
[laughs] I think you're gonna have to show me how to do that move.
Let's thank all the contestants for their hard work today.
translation.it: Ringraziamo tutti i concorrenti per il loro impegno.

translation.en: -Great job, everyone! -[Cory] Eee...
But, not everyone can be a winner...
or a 17-time winner.
The votes are in!
The winner is...
[Dr. Wiperglass] Cory and Chrissy Carson! -[gasps] -[crowd cheers]
We won! We won!
[chuckles] Thank you! Thank you, everyone!
Congratulations, Cory!
And where's the star performer?
-Star performer? -[crowd chants] Chrissy! Chrissy!
Go ahead.
[crowd chanting] Chrissy! Chrissy! Chrissy!
Chrissy! Chrissy! Chrissy! Chrissy!
OK. How about a group picture?
translation.it: Ok, facciamo una foto di gruppo?

translation.en: Cory, would you switch places with Chrissy?
translation.it: Cory, cambieresti di posto con Chrissy?

translation.en: You're, uh-- [chuckles] You're blockin' the trophy.
translation.it: Cory, cambieresti di posto con Chrissy? Stai coprendo il trofeo.

translation.en: Oh, uh, OK.
Now, everyone say, [sing-songy] "Seventeen!"
Seventeen? Seventeen!
A victory like this calls for some ice cream!
-Ice cream! -Yay!
Hey! [gasps] It's that Carson kid!
Oh, hey, guys.
Yeah, it's really me.
-Wow! Yeah! -What? -[fan boy] You are so cute! -[giggles]
[fan girl] Chrissy, can you show us that dance?
Hey, I could show it to you.
Oh, yeah, you're the backup dancer, right?
translation.it: Sei il ballerino di supporto, vero?

translation.en: Uh, no. Actually--
Ooh, Chrissy! You think you can do that dance for us?
translation.it: Chrissy, faresti quel ballo per noi?

translation.en: [sing-songy] I've got some music! Hit it!
Dance!
Come on, Chrissy. Go ahead.
OK!
-Hey, look! There she is! -[grunts] -It's Chrissy! -[grunting]
Hey, check me out. [sing-songy] I'm doing "The Chrissy!"
translation.it: Guardate! Sto facendo il ballo di Chrissy.

translation.en: "The Chrissy"?
I'm gonna make that kid a star. Hey, Chrissy! Do you know what a franchise is?
translation.it: Quella piccola diventerà una stella. Ehi, Chrissy, sai cos'è un franchising?

translation.en: Good evening, Carsons! Hi, Mr. Coaltrain!
Hey, I saw your dance!
translation.it: Ehi, ho visto il tuo ballo.

translation.en: [chuckles] Great job, Chrissy!
Uh, actually, we're a dancing team.
Oops! [chuckles] What did I say?
Oh, I meant, "Good job, Carsons!" [chuckles]
Yeah. [chuckles] Thanks.
Hey, you know, I have a nephew who really likes to dance.
translation.it: Ehi, sai che ho un nipote a cui piace ballare?

translation.en: I think I'll tell him--
Whoa! Don't mean to be rude, but looks like I'm going left.
translation.it: Scusate, ma sembra che vada a sinistra.

translation.en: Good job at the show!
I love you, Chrissy! Bye!
Looks like you have a fan, Chrissy.
translation.it: Pare che tu abbia un fan, Chrissy.

translation.en: Ah, finally home. -[phone rings] -Papa, phone, phone, phone!
-[Papa] Ooh! Just in time, too. -[sighs]
Is everything all right, sweetie?
[Cory] Oh. Hi, Mama.
Yeah, everything's great.
Great, huh?
Well, it's just--
how come everyone likes Chrissy so much?
Why don't I have any fans?
translation.it: Perché io non ho dei fan?

translation.en: Oh, honey, I'm your fan.
translation.it: Tesoro, io sono una tua fan.

translation.en: That doesn't count.
What? Sure it does.
I just mean everyone's cheering for Chrissy. It's like I wasn't even there.
translation.it: Voglio dire, tutti applaudono Chrissy. È come se io non ci fossi stato.

translation.en: Oh, Cory. Chrissy didn't take anything away from you.
translation.it: Cory, Chrissy non ti ha portato via niente.

translation.en: She just wanted to have fun with you. And you guys won, together.
translation.it: Voleva solo divertirsi con te. E avete vinto. Insieme.

translation.en: It was kinda fun.
[chuckles] There's that smile.
And besides, it was just a silly little talent show.
translation.it: E poi, era solo uno sciocco talent show.

translation.en: Yeah. I guess you're right.
Did you eat those corn dogs?
[breathing heavily] Yes. But that's not why my engine's racing.
translation.it: Sì. Ma non è per questo che il mio motore corre.

translation.en: [exhales] Mr. Coaltrain just called and he sent the video to his nephew.
translation.it: Era il sig. Carbontreno. Ha mandato il video a suo nipote.

translation.en: So? So!
His nephew is-- is--
-DJ-- -DJ Train Trax!
translation.it: suo nipote è... DJ... DJ Treno Trax.

translation.en: Oh, Chrissy, you said I could tell them.
translation.it: Avevi detto che potevo dirlo io.

translation.en: What?
What? DJ Train Trax! W--what did he say?
translation.it: DJ Treno Trax? Che ha detto?

translation.en: He said he loved your dance!
He loved it so much he wants you to be on his show!
translation.it: Così tanto da volerti nel suo show.

translation.en: Roll Train is coming to Bumperton Hills!
translation.it: Roll Train viene a Bumperton Hills.

translation.en: -Wicky-wicky woo-woo! -[gasps]
-What a day! -[laughs] Oh.
Oh, all right, kids. [chuckles] It's time to get ready for bed.
translation.it: Bene, bambini, è ora della nanna.

translation.en: No! [giggles]
Hey, get back here, you little dance machine.
I'm gonna dance for DJ Train Trax.
[yawns] Time to grab the newspaper and see what that old Carmaduke is up to.
translation.it: Prendiamo il giornale e vediamo cos'ha in mente il vecchio Carmaduke.

translation.en: Hey! My dance made the front page!
translation.it: Ehi, il mio ballo è in prima pagina!

translation.en: "The Chrissy is the best dance ever."
translation.it: IL CORNO DI BUMPERTON "Il ballo di Chrissy è il migliore di sempre."

translation.en: The Chrissy? Mama!
[Papa] Chrissy. Have some waffle, not just the syrup.
translation.it: Chrissy, mangia i waffle, non solo lo sciroppo.

translation.en: -Chrissy? Chrissy. Chrissy. Chrissy. -[slurping]
Ah, whatever.
Morning, Cory. Want some syrup?
No, thanks, Papa.
Has anybody seen Mama?
Morning, sleepy head. Hey, Frannie.
Frannie? What are you doing here?
Frannie wanted to treat us to a little business presentation over breakfast.
translation.it: Vuole parlarci d'affari durante la colazione.

translation.en: It's been very impressive so far.
[giggles] Thanks, Mrs. C.
Now, if you'll point your attention towards this very professional graph I made,
translation.it: Se osservate questo grafico molto professionale fatto da me,

translation.en: the red squiggly line indicates the dance has been skyrocketing in popularity since last night.
translation.it: la linea rossa indica che da ieri il ballo è diventato molto popolare.

translation.en: With approval ratings like this, well-- [chuckles] can you say, "college fund"?
translation.it: Con questo indice di gradimento... Beh, le tasse universitarie...

translation.en: Ooh, I like the sound of that!
Would you like some more to eat, sweetie? No, thanks. I'm stuffed.
translation.it: - Vuoi mangiare ancora? - No, grazie. Sono piena.

translation.en: I couldn't eat another bite of your delicious cooking.
Besides, we don't really have any time
if we're gonna make it to the Roll Train commercial shoot.
translation.it: prima dello spot per il Roll Train.

translation.en: Roll Train commercial shoot?
translation.it: Uno spot per il Roll Train?

translation.en: Do you think DJ Train Trax is gonna be there?
I wouldn't doubt it, sweetheart.
It's not Roll Train without the DJ.
translation.it: Non c'è nessun Roll Train senza il DJ.

translation.en: OK, everyone, let's roll out!
Let's go, kids.
-Come on, Chrissy! -[Papa] Haha! Come on, come on, come on! Let's go!
-This is so exciting! -[Papa laughs]
I can't wait to meet DJ Train Trax!
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di conoscere DJ Treno Trax.

translation.en: [Cory] The Chrissy?
translation.it: IL BALLO DI CHRISSY "Il ballo di Chrissy"?

translation.en: Um... Maybe they haven't finished adding your name to the giant sign in the middle of town.
translation.it: Dovranno ancora aggiungere il tuo nome al cartello gigante nel cuore della città.

translation.en: Yeah.
Uh, I'm sure it's a work in progress.
I don't know. "The Chrissy" is spelled so big there isn't room for "Cory."
translation.it: La scritta è così grande che non c'è posto per "Cory".

translation.en: I mean, look at it! I bet you could see it from the highway.
Hey, why don't we go inside?
Cory? You coming?
Um, Mama? We did the dance together.
translation.it: Mamma, abbiamo fatto il ballo insieme.

translation.en: Why are they calling it "The Chrissy"?
Aww, sweetie. I'm so sorry.
Maybe we can go talk to someone to get this all straightened out.
translation.it: Potremmo parlarne con qualcuno per chiarire.

translation.en: Yeah, I think that's a great idea.
Uh, OK.
Check this out!
Roll Train! This is amazing!
[Cory] It's really Roll Train. This is so cool!
translation.it: È davvero il Roll Train. È troppo forte!

translation.en: This is all for you, my superstar.
translation.it: È tutto per te, mia superstar.

translation.en: OK, guys! Can we go tell somebody about the thing now?
translation.it: Ok, ragazzi, ora possiamo andare a dirlo a qualcuno?

translation.en: Tell somebody about what thing?
-[all gasp] -[Mama] Oh, my gosh! It's Loose Caboose! Oh, wow! You're really famous!
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio! È Loco-Motore. Wow! Lei è davvero famoso.

translation.en: And really, really adorable!
I wish I could squeeze your cheek! Uh, but, I won't! Unless you want me to.
translation.it: Le strizzerei la guancia, ma non lo farò... se non vuole.

translation.en: Uh, I'm cool.
Papa, don't you have something you want to talk to the Caboose about?
translation.it: Papà, non hai niente da dire al locomotore?

translation.en: Oh, right! Can you please sign my bumper sticker?
No. Mama, remember? The thing we were gonna tell them!
translation.it: No! Mamma, ricordi quella cosa di cui gli avremmo parlato?

translation.en: Oh! [laughs] Of course. There's been a little mix up.
I'd like you to meet my two children, Cory and Chrissy.
translation.it: Vorrei presentarle i miei due figli, Cory e Chrissy.

translation.en: Huh? Mama!
Oh! [chuckles] Whoops! Sorry, I'm a little nervous.
translation.it: Ops! Scusa. Sono un po' nervosa.

translation.en: This is the one that came up with the dance.
translation.it: Ecco chi ha inventato il ballo.

translation.en: Of course! Chrissy came up with the dance. That's why it's called "The Chrissy."
translation.it: Certo, Chrissy ha inventato il ballo. Per questo è "il ballo di Chrissy".

translation.en: No! That's not right.
So, you didn't come up with the dance? This one did. Congrats!
translation.it: Quindi non hai inventato tu il ballo, ma lei? Brava!

translation.en: No, no, no!
What we're trying to say is that Cory's the one who--
Here he comes!
Wickita-wickita-wickita-wickita-wickita. -Whoo-whoo! -[horn blows]
Mm! Never gets old.
-[music stops] -Yep. The platform works.
Great job, everybody. It's gonna be a great show.
translation.it: Bel lavoro, ragazzi. Sarà un grande spettacolo.

translation.en: [yelling] DJ Train Trax!
Yo! What a radical-looking group of groovy cars we have over here!
translation.it: Ehi! Ma che gruppo radicale di auto fortissime che abbiamo qui!

translation.en: My name is DJ Train Trax. Nice to meet you all.
translation.it: Mi chiamo DJ Treno Trax. Piacere di conoscervi.

translation.en: My name's Cory, Cory Carson! I'm your biggest fan ever!
translation.it: Sono Cory, Cory Carson. Sono il suo più grande fan.

translation.en: Right on, little dude.
And we're the Carson family. I'm Mama, this is Papa--
translation.it: E noi siamo la famiglia Carson. Io sono la mamma e lui il papà.

translation.en: And I think I already know who this little lady is.
translation.it: E credo di sapere chi è questa signorina.

translation.en: -You must be Chrissy Carson. -[giggles]
[DJ Train Trax] Your dance is really groovy stuff!
translation.it: Il tuo ballo è davvero fortissimo.

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Trax, there's something I wanted to tell you--
And I'm Frannie Fenderson of Frannie Fenderson Talent Agency.
translation.it: E io sono Frannie Fenderson, dell'Agenzia di talenti.

translation.en: Chrissy, here, is one of my most promising clients.
translation.it: Chrissy è una delle mie clienti più promettenti.

translation.en: Nice! Glad to see this little superstar's in good hands.
translation.it: È bello vedere che questa superstar è in buone mani.

translation.en: Oh-ho-ho. We got big plans. We're gonna actually take her global.
translation.it: Abbiamo grandi progetti, a livello internazionale.

translation.en: Actually-- [nervous chuckle] that reminds me, there's a thing I wanted to tell you.
translation.it: A proposito, c'è una cosa di cui volevo parlarle.

translation.en: OK, sure.
There you are! Chrissy and Cory, we've got a commercial shoot to do.
translation.it: Eccovi. Chrissy e Cory, dobbiamo girare lo spot.

translation.en: We need to get started. Let's get you guys against that backdrop.
translation.it: Dobbiamo iniziare. Mettetevi davanti al fondale.

translation.en: Right this way.
[Cory] Uh, Mr. Trax? What is it, little man?
Hey, Trax? We need to rehearse the opening routine, one more time.
We'll talk later, little guy. Stay groovy.
Cory! What's the hold up, kiddo?
We've got magic to make!
Bah! Come on!
[humming] Roll Train! Cory, dance.
-[Chrissy giggles] -[laughs] That's great, Chrissy!
[whispering] I can see why she's the star.
translation.it: Capisco perché è lei la stella.

translation.en: [normal] Uh, Cory? Try and look like you're having fun.
Smile for the camera, sweetie.
That's somehow worse.
Maybe smile less.
I'm sensing a serious lack of grooviness over here.
translation.it: Percepisco una mancanza di forza, qui.

translation.en: You can't dance without some jams.
translation.it: Non si balla senza musica a palla.

translation.en: -[funky music playing] -Oh, yeah. Crispy!
That's it! You're feelin' it!
Try a reverse 180 groove slide.
Ha-ha! That's it! Get into it.
Looking great, kids!
Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
Yeah, this is great!
And, cut! Great job, everybody. I think we got everything we need, right?
translation.it: E stop. Ottimo lavoro. Abbiamo tutto, vero?

translation.en: -Yeah! -[laughs]
That was amazing, Chrissy! The camera loves you.
translation.it: Fantastico, Chrissy. Sei fotogenica. Sei nata per essere una stella.

translation.en: You were born to be a star.
translation.it: Sei fotogenica. Sei nata per essere una stella.

translation.en: Good work, guys! I'll see you two at the show.
translation.it: Ottimo lavoro, ragazzi! Ci vediamo allo spettacolo.

translation.en: Wait, uh, DJ Train Trax?
Hey, what's up?
The dance. It's my dance. I came up with it.
translation.it: Il ballo è mio. L'ho inventato io.

translation.en: Yeah, little man. I know.
You know?
Yeah. You and your sister did a great job coming up with it!
translation.it: Sì, tu e tua sorella siete stati bravissimi a inventarlo.

translation.en: Thank you. Um, but--
translation.it: Grazie. Ma voglio dire che non è proprio "di Chrissy".

translation.en: what I mean is, it's not really "The Chrissy."
translation.it: Ma voglio dire che non è proprio "di Chrissy".

translation.en: [producer] Trax, we need you for the meeting!
translation.it: Trax, ci servi per la riunione.

translation.en: Hey, little man, I gotta go, but nice work.
translation.it: Piccolo, devo andare, ma bel lavoro.

translation.en: Can't wait to see The Chrissy on the show.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di vedere il ballo di Chrissy.

translation.en: But-- [sighs] it's my dance.
Hey, Cory! Time is money, baby! Let's roll out!
translation.it: Ehi, Cory! Il tempo è denaro, piccolo. Andiamo.

translation.en: Pretty impressive, huh?
Cool! Sure is a lot of stuff.
translation.it: - Forte! - Di sicuro ci sono tante cose.

translation.en: I like it! Chrissy!
We've got it all-- bumper stickers, mugs, key chains, air fresheners,
translation.it: C'è tutto: adesivi, tazze, portachiavi, deodoranti per auto,

translation.en: those little handle things for eating corn on the cob.
Ooh, collectibles. It's me!
Where's mine?
Look behind you.
Huh? Plungers?
I'm a plunger? We had to diversify the product line,
and the resemblance is kind of uncanny.
translation.it: e la somiglianza è alquanto sbalorditiva.

translation.en: This has gone too far.
I have to find a way to win back my dance move.
Your dance move?
Yeah, you know--
Oh, you mean The Chrissy.
translation.it: Ah, intendi il ballo di Chrissy!

translation.en: Gah! That's what I'm talking about!
Too bad you can't come up with a better dance move.
translation.it: Peccato che non trovi un passo migliore.

translation.en: My Aunt Susan's a great dancer, and she invented upwards of four different moves.
translation.it: Mia zia Susan è una ballerina e ha inventato oltre quattro passi.

translation.en: Wait, say that again.
-My Aunt Susan's-- -N-n-n-no, before that.
Oh, uh, you mean The Chrissy? No, after that.
translation.it: - Il ballo di Chrissy? - No, dopo.

translation.en: Ugh, never mind. I know what I have to do.
translation.it: Non importa. So cosa devo fare.

translation.en: I'm going to invent a new dance move called "The Cory,"
translation.it: Inventerò un nuovo passo: il ballo di Cory.

translation.en: and it will be the greatest dance of all time!
translation.it: E sarà il ballo migliore di tutti i tempi!

translation.en: And I'll make a healthy snack.
Are you OK?
OK, what about this one? Ready?
[gulps] Oh, ready.
Don't blink or you'll miss it!
I won't blink.
OK, here it is.
Well, uh, I've-- I've never seen anything like it before.
translation.it: Beh, non ho mai visto niente di simile.

translation.en: Meh, it's not very good.
Hey, it's a work in progress.
Why don't you try doing this?
Ooh-hoo! Uh-huh! Oh, yeah! You got it! You got it! Mm-hmm!
Yeah, yeah! And move your tires like this.
translation.it: Sì, e muovi le gomme così.

translation.en: Whoa! Ooh! Huh! Oh, yeah! [grunting] Oh, yeah!
Yeah, that's good! Try wigglin' a little bit more.
translation.it: Sì, bravo. Dimenati un po' di più.

translation.en: Now spin around!
Faster! Faster! Whoo!
[panting] Hey, this feels good. What do you think, Freddie?
translation.it: Bella sensazione! Che ne dici, Freddie?

translation.en: Mmm... well...
I'm doing The Chrissy, aren't I?
translation.it: Sto facendo il ballo di Chrissy, vero?

translation.en: Mmm... yeah.
It looked good, though.
Come on, Freddie. Time to kick it up a notch.
translation.it: Su, Freddie. È ora di alzare il tiro.

translation.en: Yes!
♪ Hero of orange, stripes of white ♪
translation.it: Eroe dalle strisce bianche E dalle quattro ruote

translation.en: ♪ Move like the wind and ready to fight ♪
translation.it: Pronto a combattere Neanche il vento mi scuote

translation.en: ♪ There's a rhythm in me That I have to find ♪
translation.it: C'è un ritmo in me che devo trovare

translation.en: ♪ A beat in time ♪
♪ I'm just a dancing guy ♪
♪ Groovin' all the time ♪
♪ Gotta find that rhythm ♪
♪ I'll walk through fire ♪ ♪ To the edge of time ♪
translation.it: Attraverso il fuoco Per quanto dovrà durare

translation.en: ♪ Won't stop till the whole wide world ♪ ♪ Can see me shine ♪
translation.it: Non smetterò finché tutto il mondo Non mi vedrà brillare

translation.en: ♪ Every dancer has to become the dance ♪
translation.it: Ogni ballerino deve diventare il ballo

translation.en: ♪ And I-- I think I finally found it This time ♪
translation.it: E credo finalmente Di averlo trovato questa volta

translation.en: ♪ No, no, not this time ♪
♪ There's a rhythm I still have to find ♪
translation.it: C'è un ritmo che devo ancora trovare

translation.en: ♪ A beat in time ♪
♪ I can feel it shine, shine, shine ♪
♪ Shine ♪
♪ I'll race through forests And cross the open seas ♪
translation.it: Corro nelle foreste E attraverso il mare aperto

translation.en: Whoa! Ooh! ♪ Till I find ♪ ♪ The magic rhythm that's in me ♪ Whoa! Whoa!
translation.it: Finché non trovo il ritmo magico Che è in me, ne sono certo

translation.en: -That's it! -[gasps]
Come over here, everybody! Cory's got a new dance!
translation.it: Venite qui. Cory ha un nuovo ballo.

translation.en: -[dance music playing] -Whoa. Oh, yeah! Uh-huh! Oh, yeah!
That was amazing!
I loved what you were doing with your tires!
That's my friend!
[chanting] Go Cory! Go Cory! Go Cory!
Dance with Cory!
I've never seen anything like that. What is that called?
translation.it: Non ho mai visto niente così. Come si chiama?

translation.en: "The Cory."
Introducing our first guest--
He's from a small town but has some big talent!
translation.it: Viene da una piccola città, ma ha un grande talento.

translation.en: Mmm, give it up for--
-[pauses TV] -Cory Carson, performing his new dance,
translation.it: Cory Carson col suo nuovo ballo,

translation.en: The Cory!
Whoa! Oh, yeah! It's The Cory! It's The Cory!
translation.it: Oh, sì! È il ballo di Cory.

translation.en: That was star-tastic! Can we see that again?
translation.it: È stato stell-tastico! Possiamo vederlo di nuovo?

translation.en: -[pauses TV] -Oh, no-no-no-no-no. I couldn't possibly. It'd be too much.
translation.it: Oh, no, non potrei. Sarebbe troppo.

translation.en: But, if you insist!
Dance with Cory! [giggles]
Chrissy! What are you doing? I need to practice.
translation.it: Chrissy, che stai facendo? Devo esercitarmi.

translation.en: Chrissy-Cory dance.
Oh, yeah! Mm-hmm!
What? Chrissy, stop!
[giggles] Chrissy!
What? No!
Chrissy, that's my dance.
translation.it: Cosa? No! Chrissy! È il mio ballo. Non puoi prenderlo.

translation.en: You're not allowed to take it.
translation.it: È il mio ballo. Non puoi prenderlo.

translation.en: You already took The Chrissy. You aren't taking this one, too.
translation.it: Hai già preso il ballo di Chrissy. Non prenderai anche questo.

translation.en: Cory dance with Chrissy?
No, Chrissy. I wanna dance alone.
translation.it: No, Chrissy. Voglio ballare da solo.

translation.en: No more dance?
[Mama] Can't sleep?
Oh! Uh, nope.
I was just getting a snack.
Thanks, Mama.
So, you excited about the show tomorrow?
Yeah, uh, totally.
Cory, I'm sorry this week hasn't gone the way you hoped it would,
translation.it: Mi dispiace che questa settimana non sia andata come speravi,

translation.en: but I just want you to know, I'm really proud of you.
translation.it: ma voglio che tu sappia che sono molto fiera di te.

translation.en: Really?
Your papa and I are so excited to see you dance on Roll Train tomorrow.
translation.it: Io e papà siamo felicissimi di vederti ballare al Roll Train.

translation.en: And what are we supposed to remember before any performance?
translation.it: Cosa dobbiamo ricordare prima di un'esibizione?

translation.en: just have fun?
So... tomorrow...
-just have fun, OK? -[laughs]
[Cory laughs] OK, I will, I will.
[Mama] Now, try to get some sleep.
OK, Mama.
That girl loves dancing with her big brother. Thanks for being such a good one, Cory.
translation.it: Chrissy adora ballare con te. Sei un bravo fratellone, Cory.

translation.en: Goodnight. [kisses]
[painter] Ah, perfect.
[crowd member 1] Oh, I can't wait to see this! [crowd member 2] I have all of their bumper stickers.
translation.it: - Non vedo l'ora. - Ho tutti i loro adesivi.

translation.en: Ooh! I love Roll Train.
She's the best dancer! [both] Ever!
Best seat in the house.
Oh, sorry, bit of a wide load here. Comin' through.
Thanks, Dad!
Hey, down in front!
[Loose Caboose] Carsons, you're here!
Hi, Caboose!
Follow me.
Looks pretty good all lit up, huh?
How we doin', Phil? No fires yet.
translation.it: - Come va, Phil? - Ancora niente fuochi.

translation.en: Cory, we're gonna have you on the lower platform.
translation.it: Cory, tu sarai sul palco inferiore.

translation.en: Go ahead, Cory. OK.
Chrissy...
we'll have you up here on the star platform,
translation.it: tu sarai sul palco delle stelle.

translation.en: right next to you know who.
translation.it: Proprio accanto a chi sai tu.

translation.en: And on DJ Train Trax's cue, you'll be lifted up into [echoes] super stardom!
translation.it: E al segnale di DJ Treno Trax, sarai innalzata alla super fama.

translation.en: Psst. We're live in two minutes, Caboose.
Positions. Positions, everyone.
-[indistinct chatter] -Two minutes till showtime, folks. Let's go! Positions!
translation.it: Due minuti allo spettacolo. Su, in posizione.

translation.en: Ready? Ready!
No!
What's wrong, Chrissy? No more dance.
That's a good one, Chrissy.
Come on. It's dance time!
No more dance!
Yo! [laughs] What's the commotion over here?
It's Chrissy. I'm not sure she wants to do the dance, DJ.
translation.it: È Chrissy. Credo che non voglia ballare, DJ.

translation.en: Ah, I see.
I don't understand what could've happened.
We couldn't get her to stop dancing just yesterday.
translation.it: Ieri non riuscivamo a farla smettere di ballare.

translation.en: Hey, little lady. It's OK. Everyone gets nervous.
translation.it: Ehi, piccola, va tutto bene. Si innervosiscono tutti.

translation.en: We'd hate to do the show without you.
Are you sure you don't wanna do the dance with us?
translation.it: Sei sicura di non voler ballare con noi?

translation.en: No more dance!
All right, that's fine by me. That's cool.
But, uh, we really can't do The Chrissy without Chrissy.
translation.it: Ma non possiamo fare il ballo senza Chrissy.

translation.en: It will be just the "The."
[Frannie] That's why we're changing it.
We're doin' "The Cory," represented by Frannie Fenderson Talent Agency.
translation.it: Faremo il ballo di Cory, rappresentato dall'Agenzia di talenti Frannie Fenderson.

translation.en: I thought you worked for Chrissy.
I don't follow the puck, Mr. Trax. I head wherever the puck is going to be.
translation.it: Non seguo la palla, signor Trax. Vado dove la palla andrà.

translation.en: Wait, what's the plan, exactly?
Rebranding.
Did you know my boy, Cory, here has his own dance called The Cory?
translation.it: Il mio amico ha un suo ballo: il ballo di Cory.

translation.en: I've seen it. It's even better than The Chrissy.
translation.it: È anche meglio del ballo di Chrissy.

translation.en: That true, Cory? Did you really come up with your own dance?
translation.it: È vero, Cory? Hai inventato il tuo ballo?

translation.en: Well, yeah, I did.
Cory, my man, are you OK to do the dance alone?
translation.it: Cory, ti sta bene ballare da solo?

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I can dance alone.
[Papa] Chrissy? Where you goin', honey?
-Slow down! -I'm sorry about all this.
Please, it's fine. We've got this.
translation.it: Per favore, tranquilla. Ci pensiamo noi.

translation.en: Cory, you OK?
Uh, yeah, Mama.
We'll be watching!
OK, everyone, we are doing The Cory. I repeat, we are doing The Cory.
translation.it: Ok, faremo il ballo di Cory. Ripeto. Faremo il ballo di Cory.

translation.en: [Phil, over radio] Change it to "The Cory." Okie dokie. [grunts]
Rolling and... action.
-[crowd cheers] -[Loose Caboose] All aboard! It's time to hop on the Roll Train!
translation.it: Tutti a bordo! È ora di salire sul Roll Train.

translation.en: We've got a great show lined up for you tonight.
[on TV] If you're in Bumperton Hills, this is the place to be.
translation.it: Se siete a Bumperton Hills, questo è il posto giusto.

translation.en: [Loose Caboose] Give it up for the Roll Train Locomotions!
translation.it: Un applauso per le Locomotive Roll Train!

translation.en: [Frannie] Don't get emotional, kid.
You're about to get everything you ever wanted,
translation.it: Presto avrai ciò che hai sempre voluto

translation.en: and I will get ten percent of everything you ever wanted.
translation.it: e io avrò il 10% di ciò che hai sempre voluto.

translation.en: -What? -Oh! Uh, nothing.
Pop a tire out there, Cory!
You ready, little man?
Yeah, I think so.
Great. I'll do the intro and then my brother will send you up.
translation.it: Bene! Io farò la presentazione e mio fratello ti manderà su.

translation.en: Your brother?
Yeah, you know, that guy.
Phil? Phil is your brother?
No! No. That guy.
Let's get camera four ready for DJ's intro.
translation.it: Prepariamo la camera quattro per DJ.

translation.en: The Loose Caboose is your brother?
Sure is. He's a good one, too.
I wouldn't be up here if it wasn't for him.
translation.it: Non sarei qui se non fosse per lui.

translation.en: The dance moves, the catch phrases,
translation.it: I passi di ballo, gli slogan,

translation.en: [laughs] the wicky-wicky-whoo-whoo! He came up with all that.
translation.it: il Wicky-wicky-ciuf-ciuf... ha inventato tutto lui.

translation.en: Really? [DJ Train Trax] Yeah.
He even came up with the name "Roll Train."
translation.it: E anche il nome Roll Train.

translation.en: I wanted to call the show "Funky Dance Time."
translation.it: Io avevo scelto L'Ora del ballo funky.

translation.en: [laughs] That's horrible! [laughs] I know! I know.
I owe a lot to him. The best part of this show
translation.it: Gli devo molto. La parte migliore di questo show

translation.en: is that we get to do it together.
Huh. Yeah.
[Loose Caboose] And now, here's your locomotive of locomotion, everybody's favorite friend of funk--
translation.it: Ecco la locomotiva di locomozione, l'amico del funk più amato...

translation.en: -D-d-d-d-d-DJ... -That's my cue.
translation.it: - È il mio segnale. - ... DJ Treno Trax.

translation.en: -...Train Trax! -Just remember,
translation.it: - È il mio segnale. - ... DJ Treno Trax. Ricorda: non c'è un modo sbagliato di ballare, finché ti diverti.

translation.en: there's no wrong way to dance as long as you're having fun.
translation.it: Ricorda: non c'è un modo sbagliato di ballare, finché ti diverti.

translation.en: See you up there, Cory.
Wicky-wicky whoo-whoo!
Give it up one more time
translation.it: Un altro applauso per le Locomotive Roll Train!

translation.en: -for the Roll Train Locomotions! -[Chrissy] Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
translation.it: Un altro applauso per le Locomotive Roll Train! Sì!

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! Woo! -Now, it's time to introduce... -[giggles] -...a very special guest from Bumperton...
translation.it: È il momento di presentarvi un ospite speciale di Bumperton Hills!

translation.en: [Loose Caboose] And back to DJ Train Trax.
-Well, let's get right to it then. -[sighs] Chrissy.
[DJ Train Trax] Yeah.
Ladies and gentlemen, I give you... Cory Carson
translation.it: Signore e signori, vi presento Cory Carson

translation.en: performing his new signature dance move-- The Cory!
translation.it: che esegue il suo nuovo passo: il ballo di Cory.

translation.en: [Loose Caboose] Cut to commercial. Cut to commercial.
[DJ Train Trax] We'll be right back.
Love my natural spring water.
-Chrissy? Chrissy? -[indistinct chatter] Chrissy!
[Mama] Chrissy? Sweetie? [Papa] Come on out, Chrissy.
[gasps] Chrissy!
Cory? What are you doing here?
Where's Chrissy?
Oh, she's still a bit camera shy. We can't get her to come out.
translation.it: È ancora un po' timida. Non riusciamo a farla uscire.

translation.en: Do you think I could try talking to her?
OK, people, this is not a drill. We are at Defcon derailed.
translation.it: Ok, siamo in una situazione di massima allerta.

translation.en: Caboose! W-what do we do? We can't find the kids anywhere!
translation.it: Loco-Motore, che si fa? Non troviamo i bambini.

translation.en: I don't know. This is a huge mess!
translation.it: Non lo so. È un gran pasticcio.

translation.en: Did someone say, "mess"?
I've been cleanin' up messes for 28 years.
Who are you?
Chrissy?
I'm sorry, Chrissy.
I got so caught up with being a good dancer,
translation.it: Volevo così tanto essere un bravo ballerino

translation.en: I stopped being a good brother.
translation.it: che ho smesso di essere un bravo fratello.

translation.en: This whole thing was supposed to be fun,
but it's no fun without you.
translation.it: Ma... non è divertente senza di te.

translation.en: Remember this one?
I call this one "The Chris-ory!"
[chuckles] I call this move "The Chrissy Cory Crissy-cross!"
[giggles] Cory Train Trax!
I'm sorry, Chrissy.
Let's go home.
[Chrissy] No!
Dance with Cory!
Really?
Yeah!
Aww. OK, then. [mimics Loose Caboose] Let's get down!
Comin' through! Trax, Trax!
translation.it: Permesso. Trax, questo tipo faceva il cantante.

translation.en: This guy said he used to be a singer.
translation.it: Trax, questo tipo faceva il cantante.

translation.en: I think it's our only option at this point.
Right on.
Finally.
[Phil, over radio] We're changing "The Cory"
translation.it: IL BALLO DI CORY Cambia "Il ballo di Cory" con "Il bidello".

translation.en: to "The Janitor."
translation.it: Cambia "Il ballo di Cory" con "Il bidello".

translation.en: OK, this is where you'll be.
Better take your position, Trax.
translation.it: Vai in posizione, Trax. Tu, seguimi.

translation.en: You, follow me. You really saved our caboose.
translation.it: Vai in posizione, Trax. Tu, seguimi. Ci hai salvato il vagone.

translation.en: [chuckles] Here it is.
translation.it: Ci hai salvato il vagone. Eccola.

translation.en: [Cory] We're here!
Huh? Where have you been?
I didn't wanna go on without my sister, but I talked to her and we're ready to go on together.
translation.it: Non volevo continuare senza mia sorella, ma le ho parlato e ora balleremo insieme.

translation.en: That's great, little man!
So, what dance are we doing?
The Chrissy!
[Phil, over radio] Change it back to "The Chrissy."
translation.it: IL BIDELLO - Cambia: "Il ballo di Chrissy". - Mi licenzio!

translation.en: Change it yourself. I quit.
translation.it: - Cambia: "Il ballo di Chrissy". - Mi licenzio!

translation.en: -Hey! -Huh?
Where are you going? There's room up here for you, too!
translation.it: Dove vai? Quassù c'è posto anche per te.

translation.en: Yeah!
Really?
We're on in ten.
Ten seconds. Ten seconds, everyone.
Hey, Cory. Nice job.
With the dance?
Nah, for being a groovy older brother.
translation.it: No. Perché sei un fratello maggiore fortissimo.

translation.en: Thanks, DJ Train Trax.
-Ready? -Ready!
-[funky music playing] -Wicka-wicka whoo-whoo!
Welcome back to Roll Train!
Next up, we've got quite the treat for you--
translation.it: E ora, una bella sorpresa per voi.

translation.en: a voice of satin, a heart of gold,
translation.it: Una voce di seta, un cuore d'oro,

translation.en: a groovy mustache that doesn't get old.
translation.it: dei fortissimi baffi che non invecchiano.

translation.en: Give it up for...
uh, this guy!
[singing beautifully] ♪ The stars shine brighter together ♪
translation.it: Le stelle brillano di più se sono insieme

translation.en: ♪ What if you and I were together? ♪
translation.it: E se noi due stessimo insieme?

translation.en: It's like listening to an angel.
♪ 'Cause I believe in you ♪
♪ And if you believe in me, too ♪
translation.it: E se anche tu credi in me

translation.en: ♪ There's nothing that we cannot achieve ♪ [female crowd member] Aah!
translation.it: Non c'è niente che non possiamo ottenere

translation.en: ♪ When we're together ♪
[DJ Train Trax] And now, Cory and Chrissy Carson performing The Chrissy!
translation.it: E ora, Cory e Chrissy Carson si esibiranno nel ballo di Chrissy.

translation.en: -[funky music playing] -Whoo-hoo! Oh, yeah! Uh-huh!
All right, Bumperton Hills!
Let's get down!
Come on!
Ooh, let's get this party started!
Kimmy on the Roll Train. Timmy on the Roll Train.
translation.it: Kimmy al Roll Train. Timmy al Roll Train.

translation.en: -Everybody get on this stage! -Oh, yeah! -Wicky-wicky whoo-whoo! -[laughs]
translation.it: - Tutti sul palco! - Oh, sì! Wicky-wicky-ciuf-ciuf!

translation.en: Care to dance, Mama? -Oh, my! -[laughs]
It's all about the wipers, baby!
Come on, Freddie, let's get this train rollin'!
Mom, you've gotta move your tires like this.
Go ahead, Caboose! Cut it loose!
Ah, yeah, that's my brother.
-The Chrissy, The Chrissy... -Wicky-wicky whoo-whoo!
-Oh, yeah! Uh-huh! Ooh-ooh-ooh! -Oh, yeah! Mm-hmm! Oh, yeah!
translation.it: Il ballo di Chrissy! - Oh, sì! - Oh, sì!

translation.en: Here's my card. Give me a call if you want to talk about your future.
translation.it: Il mio biglietto da visita... Se vuoi parlare del tuo futuro.

translation.en: Yeah, let's get it, y'all!
[all] Wicka-wicka whoo-whoo!
